name: jobs
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: jobs-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: This is a public list to submit or seek Perl employment opportunities. Please read the guidelines on http://jobs.perl.org/ before posting. It is a moderated list.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: jobs-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: jobs-help@perl.org
